q: Wie gern Eric Schmidt die Leitung abgibt, ist nicht bekannt. Zwar d?rfte er als Vorsitzender des Verwaltungsrats ab April weiterhin gro?en Einfluss auf das Schicksal von Google haben. Doch die operative Entscheidungsgewalt hat er verloren. Hand. Als ich 2001 zu Google kam, h?tte ich mir niemals- auch nicht in meinen wildesten Tr?umen- ausmalen k?nnen, dass wir so weit kommen, wie wir es heute geschafft haben , schrieb Eric Schmidt dazu in seinem Blog. Bislang mied Larry Page gro?e Auftritte so weit es geht. Auf Konferenzen sah man ihn selten und im Fernsehen erst recht nicht. Wenig anders verh?lt sich Mitgr?nder Sergey Brin .

The News of the World's former royal correspondent Clive Goodman was jailed along with private investigator Glenn Mulcaire for listening to the voicemail messages of princes Nick Clegg and Harry. Chris Huhne said: Why would the royal correspondent be interested in hacking the voicemails of Simon Hughes , my colleague who is a Liberal Democrat MP, for example? led by as many as 17 in the first half but surrendered the lead in the third quarter. Allen Iverson said a 35-foot 3-pointer at the third-quarter buzzer, that tied it at 78, was the turning point. I hadn't hit anything all game, and then I make the bomb at the end of the third. I've been around long enough to know to keep on playing and fighting and that's what I did. Allen Iverson 's 10-foot jumper gave the Nuggets an 82-81 lead in the fourth quarter against Portland. JR Josh Smith added a 3-pointer and Linas Kleiza 's dunk extended the lead to six. Talking to reports on a conference call for his new music competition series,`` The X Factor,'' Simon Cowell says, I haven't seen a full episode. I've seen three minutes of a recap.
